statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND email = 'example@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M' AND (date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' OR date_of_birth > '2000-01-01');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE joined_date < '2020-01-01' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Male'
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE favorite_brand = 'Nike' AND shoe_size = '10'
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference = 'High Quality'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 50 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 AND stock_quantity < 10;
